channel.title: CVE Feed for HandySoft -- HandySoft Groupware(HShell.dll) for for Windows 7, 8, 10

item.title: CVE-2020-7804|2024-08-04T09:41:01.878Z -- handysoft -- handysoft%20groupware%28hshell.dll%29%20for%20%20for%20windows%207%2C%208%2C%2010
item.description: ActiveX Control(HShell.dll) in Handy Groupware 1.7.3.1 for Windows 7, 8, and 10 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary command via the ShellExec method.
